description: Keep track of life totals in Magic:  The Gathering(c) hands-free with this app.  This app provides multiple voice commands to manage players in the game.  Players can be added to a game.  A game can be reset.  Players can have their life totals added or subtracted.  Currently this app only supports 2 players and default life totals are 20.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, tell life counter to add Brandon
Alexa, ask life counter what are the life totals
Alexa, tell life counter to reset the game
name: Life Counter for MTG
shortDescription: Keeps count of life totals in Magic: The Gathering
